wikipedia_page.main: Peter Richard Carey (born 14 April 1933 in Barking, Essex, England), is an English footballer who played as a left back in the Football League. He later managed Barking from January 1982 until December 1983. In March 2011, he was retired, living in Brentwood, Essex.

response: *Peter Carey (Australian rules footballer) (born 1954), Australian rules player for Glenelg
*Peter Carey (historian) (born 1948), British historian of south-east Asia
